entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug]: MSBuild crashes on parallel build using docker #43750
  • Let me define the path to built assemblies for dotnet `publish --no-build` #43747
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24474.11] paint.netcore build with error "Missing partial modifier on declaration of type 'AffineTransform2DEffect3'; another partial declaration of this type exists" #43746

PullRequests

Created

  • Create a dotnet-new template for .gitattributes #43764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43759
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make a parallel loop for define static web assets #43743
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix baseline manifest version for RTM branding #43737
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Support additional VS component IDs for workloads #43675
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • [release/9.0.1xx] BinSkim: Enable CFG #43695
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-Workloads
  • [StaticWebAssets] Delay serializing the manifest until absolutely necessary #43745
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2548289 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve logging from agent #43672
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid serializing/deserializing manifest for hash #43710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [Containers] Fix parsing and error reporting of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • fix typos #43730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WebSdk: new 'OneDeploy' publish method #43690
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
